name: NatureSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open nature sounds”
”Alexa ask nature sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nature sounds
des:
Let the peaceful sounds of nature lull you to sleep. Unwind after a long day, find solace during meditation, or create a soothing atmosphere for work or study. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Nature Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
